content.rendered: John Spellacy is a Florida criminal defense attorney who handles various criminal cases. His courtroom experience is extensive, having tried over 50 jury trials. John works tirelessly to investigate his clients’ cases, bring out all the facts and uncover every possible defense. He’ll fight to get you the best results, whether it is seeking reasonable bail to get out of jail, arguing for the suppression of evidence, pursuing the dismissal of charges, or preparing your case for trial.
